```{r,fig.height= 10, fig.width= 16}
pop_colors <- (rep(c('#39553A'), 40))
```

```{r, fig.height= 5, fig.width= 10}
area<- (ggplot(iraq_data, 
       aes(x = year, y= value))+
  geom_bar(stat= 'identity', fill= '#37573E', width = .8))+ theme_classic()+ scale_x_discrete(expand= expansion(mult=c(.03,0))) +   scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0,.5,1,1.5,2,2.5,3,3.5), limits= c(0,3.5), expand= expansion(mult=c(.15,.3)))+  
  theme(legend.position= "none",                                                
        axis.line.x=element_blank(),                                                                       
        axis.title = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x= element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.y= element_blank(),
        axis.line.y= element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.x= element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor.x= element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.y= element_line(color="black", size=.15),
        panel.grid.minor.y= element_blank(),
        plot.caption= element_markdown(hjust= 0),
        axis.text.x= element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank(),
        plot.background= element_rect(color="black"),
        plot.title= element_textbox_simple(family= "Open",size = 2, lineheight = 1, 
      width = grid::unit(2, "in"), # fixed width
      hjust = .45, # alignment of box relative to plot
      linetype = 0, # turn on border
      box.color = "black", # border color
      fill = "#6D7166", # background fill color
      r = grid::unit(0, "pt"), # radius for rounded corners
      padding = margin(0, 0, 0, 0), # padding around text inside the box
      margin = margin(0, 0, 0, 0)))


area
```
